content:
Morrill Tariff Act
	a tariff
Morrill Land Grant Act
	land given to states to expand schools for new agricultural technology & development
Homestead Act
	"vote yourself a farm"
	giving away 160 acres to anyone willing to go farm for 5 years in the (far) west
Pacific Railway Act
	build transcontinental route
National Bank Acts
	re-create national bank
Legal Tender Bill
	paper money and income tax
